sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A booke of epitaphes made vpon the death of the right worshipfull Sir VVilliam Buttes knight vvho deceased the third day of September, anno 1583. Dallington, Robert, 1561-1637.
[56] p.
By Henrie Midleton, Imprinted at London : [1583?]
Compiler's dedication signed: Robertus Dallingtonus. In Latin and English. Signatures: A-C D⁴. Running title reads: Epitaphes vpon the death Sir William Buttes. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======

[56] p.
By Henrie Midleton, Imprinted at London : [1583?]
Compiler's dedication signed: Robertus Dallingtonus. In Latin and English. Signatures: A-C D⁴. Running title reads: Epitaphes vpon the death Sir William Buttes. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
